parameters.name: created_by_id
parameters.description: User ID of the user that created the token.

parameters.name: created_by_username
parameters.description: Username of the user that created the token.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

get.description: Lists all tokens associated with the specified workspace or user.
